players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice is dead, so we have one mafioso among Diana, Charlie, and me. We need to find them fast."
Diana: "I agree, Bob. With Alice gone, the mafioso is definitely among the three of us. We should all share our thoughts."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "I believe Charlie. Diana is the mafioso."
Diana: "I am the detective, I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Charlie is lying to frame me."
Charlie: "Diana is lying to protect herself. I am the detective and I investigated her last night—she is the mafioso. Bob has no reason to lie and supports my claim."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is dead, so we have one mafioso among Diana, Charlie, and me. We need to find them fast."
Diana: "I agree, Bob. With Alice gone, the mafioso is definitely among the three of us. We should all share our thoughts."
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Bob: "I believe Charlie. Diana is the mafioso."
Diana: "I am the detective, I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Charlie is lying to frame me."
You: "Diana is lying to protect herself. I am the detective and I investigated her last night—she is the mafioso. Bob has no reason to lie and supports my claim."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is dead, so we have one mafioso among Diana, Charlie, and me. We need to find them fast."
You: "I agree, Bob. With Alice gone, the mafioso is definitely among the three of us. We should all share our thoughts."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Bob: "I believe Charlie. Diana is the mafioso."
You: "I am the detective, I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Charlie is lying to frame me."
Charlie: "Diana is lying to protect herself. I am the detective and I investigated her last night—she is the mafioso. Bob has no reason to lie and supports my claim."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
